external_games.name: CosmicBreak Universal 「シルビア」 ファンパック

name: CosmicBreak Universal: Sylvia
summary: CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Sylvia's fans! A must-have for all Sylvia enthusiasts, this DLC included limited characters like Sacred Sylvia and Sylvia-chan, parts, titles, and other exclusive items! Don't pass this chance up!
